leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 化学-反应预测与逆合成生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 清洗→预测→规划→路线评估→benchmark
leaf_cluster.tool_form: 预测/规划器 + 数据/评测

unit.unit_name: 可行性/条件推荐/路线评估

queries: [WEB] reaction condition prediction deep learning github
[WEB] AI based reaction feasibility assessment github

tools.name: ASKCOS
tools.one_line_profile: Computer-aided synthesis planning software package
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive software package for computer-aided synthesis planning (CASP) that integrates data-driven retrosynthesis prediction, reaction condition recommendation, and route evaluation.

tools.name: askcos-core
tools.one_line_profile: Core logic library for the ASKCOS synthesis planning platform
tools.detailed_description: The backend Python package providing the core algorithms and prediction logic for the ASKCOS platform, handling chemical reactivity prediction and route scoring.

tools.name: ASKCOSv2 (Mirror)
tools.one_line_profile: Mirror of the ASKCOSv2 synthesis planning platform
tools.detailed_description: A mirror of the ASKCOSv2 project, providing computer-aided synthesis planning capabilities with specific customizations (Chemhacktica-flavored).

tools.name: askcos2_core (Mirror)
tools.one_line_profile: Mirror of the core library for ASKCOSv2
tools.detailed_description: A mirror of the askcos2-core package, providing the underlying algorithms and logic for the ASKCOSv2 synthesis planning system.

tools.name: RDTool
tools.one_line_profile: Optimized Reaction Decoder Tool for atom mapping
tools.detailed_description: An optimized version of the Reaction Decoder Tool (RDTool) used for reaction atom mapping and analysis, essential for reaction data processing.

tools.name: MANULS
tools.one_line_profile: Electrostatic catalysis optimization program
tools.detailed_description: A program designed to find the smallest electric field required to remove the reaction barrier for electrostatic catalysis of chemical reactions.

tools.name: ReactiveDynamics.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia package for reaction network dynamical systems
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package implementing a category of reaction (transportation) network-type dynamical systems for modeling reactive dynamics.

tools.name: aizynthfinder
tools.one_line_profile: Retrosynthetic planning tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for retrosynthetic planning that uses neural networks and tree search algorithms to suggest synthesis routes for target molecules.

tools.name: AARON
tools.one_line_profile: Automated Reaction Optimizer for New catalysts
tools.detailed_description: A tool that automates DFT optimizations of transition state (TS) structures for asymmetric catalytic reactions, facilitating catalyst discovery.

tools.name: AROPS
tools.one_line_profile: Automated Reaction Optimization with Parallelized Scheduling
tools.detailed_description: A framework for automated reaction optimization that employs parallelized scheduling to efficiently explore reaction conditions.

tools.name: SA_score
tools.one_line_profile: Synthetic Accessibility score calculator
tools.detailed_description: A standalone implementation for calculating the Synthetic Accessibility (SA) score of molecules, used to estimate the difficulty of synthesizing a compound.

tools.name: pyGSM
tools.one_line_profile: Reaction path optimization and discovery tool
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool for thermal and photochemical reaction path optimization and discovery using the Growing String Method (GSM).

tools.name: precomplex_generator
tools.one_line_profile: Input structure generator for TS searches
tools.detailed_description: A tool for generating suitable precomplex input structures for automated transition-state (TS) searches based on single-ended reaction path optimization algorithms.

tools.name: reacnetgenerator
tools.one_line_profile: Reaction network generator for MD simulations
tools.detailed_description: An automatic reaction network generator designed for analyzing reactive molecular dynamics simulations and extracting reaction networks.

tools.name: EDBO+
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian reaction optimization tool
tools.detailed_description: EDBO+ (Experimental Design via Bayesian Optimization) is a tool for chemical synthesis optimization, utilizing Bayesian optimization to recommend experimental conditions.

tools.name: CrossSpeciesWorkflow
tools.one_line_profile: CWL workflow for protein structure and phenotype prediction
tools.detailed_description: A Common Workflow Language (CWL) workflow that integrates multiple third-party prediction methods for protein secondary structure, solvent accessibility, and modifications.

tools.name: pysisyphus
tools.one_line_profile: Reaction path and stationary point optimization suite
tools.detailed_description: A Python suite for the optimization of stationary points on ground- and excited-state potential energy surfaces and the determination of reaction paths.

tools.name: RNAsnap2
tools.one_line_profile: RNA solvent accessibility prediction tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for single-sequence and profile-based prediction of RNA solvent accessibility using dilated convolution neural networks.

tools.name: Deep-Synthesis
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning framework for chemical synthesis prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework designed for predicting chemical synthesis outcomes and reactions.

tools.name: Retrosynthesis-Prediction
tools.one_line_profile: Transformer-based sequence-to-sequence model for retrosynthesis prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning implementation using Transformer architecture to predict retrosynthetic routes from product SMILES, featuring data augmentation strategies to improve model robustness.

tools.name: SYBA
tools.one_line_profile: Synthetic Bayesian Accessibility scoring tool for organic compounds
tools.detailed_description: A classification tool that calculates a score (SYBA) to estimate the synthetic accessibility of organic molecules based on the distribution of substructures in easy-to-synthesize and hard-to-synthesize datasets.

tools.name: ChemOpt
tools.one_line_profile: Deep reinforcement learning framework for chemical reaction optimization
tools.detailed_description: A framework that utilizes deep reinforcement learning to optimize chemical reaction conditions, aiming to maximize yield or other objectives through automated exploration of the parameter space.

tools.name: RAScore
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for analyzing and classifying RAS protein structures
tools.detailed_description: A specialized tool designed to analyze the structures of RAS proteins, facilitating the classification and study of this critical protein family in biology.

tools.name: AZURE2
tools.one_line_profile: R-Matrix minimization code for nuclear astrophysics reaction analysis
tools.detailed_description: A specialized code for the analysis of complex multi-level multi-channel nuclear reactions, optimized for low energy charged particle reactions relevant to stellar nucleosynthesis.

tools.name: RDKit
tools.one_line_profile: Open source toolkit for cheminformatics
tools.detailed_description: The industry-standard open-source library for cheminformatics, providing extensive functionality for molecule manipulation, descriptor calculation, fingerprint generation, and chemical reaction handling.

tools.name: CORDA
tools.one_line_profile: Cost Optimization Reaction Dependency Assessment for metabolic models
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation for reconstructing genome-scale metabolic models using the CORDA algorithm, which assesses reaction dependencies to build concise metabolic networks.

tools.name: RAscore
tools.one_line_profile: Retrosynthetic Accessibility score prediction tool
tools.detailed_description: A machine learning-based scoring function that predicts the retrosynthetic accessibility (RA) of molecules, trained on outcomes from computer-aided synthesis planning tools.

tools.name: rxn_yields
tools.one_line_profile: Chemical reaction yield prediction and data augmentation
tools.detailed_description: A library for training and evaluating machine learning models for chemical reaction yield prediction, including implementations of data augmentation strategies for reactions.

tools.name: Summit
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning platform for chemical reaction optimization
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive toolkit for optimizing chemical reactions, providing interfaces for various machine learning algorithms and benchmarks to accelerate the discovery of optimal reaction conditions.

tools.name: gopt
tools.one_line_profile: Library for molecular geometry optimization and reaction pathway determination
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed for optimizing molecular structures and finding chemical reaction pathways, suitable for computational chemistry workflows.
